item.title: Work Experience
item.description:
BVT Construction Ltd

Builder Assistant | Beeton, ON, Canada | December 2023 - Present

  • Supported skilled tradespeople with material handling, tool operation, and construction tasks, including measuring, cutting, and demolition.
  • Collaborated with clients to scope projects, consistently achieving 100% customer satisfaction.
  • Maintained organized and safe job sites through preparation, cleanup, and proper material handling.

Bail Supervisor | Milton, ON, Canada | August 2023 - November 2023

item.title: Portfolio
item.description:
Restaurant Page

My most recent project is a simple restaurant page containing a menu of dishes, desserts, and beverages from Bosnia & Herzegovina.

This is the first project I have completed using npm and Webpack. Getting each tab of my restaurant page to render its respective content dynamically was really simple.

What I did was add an event listener to each tab, and when clicked, the innerHTML of the ‘content’ div is set to an empty string.

item.title: About
item.description:
Who am I?

My name is Edis Rahic. I am an aspiring software developer with a growing portfolio of projects built using modern web technologies, including Next.js, React, and TypeScript.

I also bring experience from the criminal justice system, where I have supported clients through the court system and coordinated community programs.

I enjoy solving problems, whether itâ€™s creating efficient software solutions or improving workflows in community services.

What was I doing before software development?

Alongside my current focus on software development, I remain intensely interested in the criminal justice system.
